amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for Federal contracts with those who violate the Fair Labor Standards Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
